alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued March 14 at 7:51AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE GALLATIN NATIONAL FOREST AVALANCHE CENTER. ISSUED ON March 14 2023 AT 07:32 am The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center is issuing a backcountry avalanche warning for the Centennial Mountains. Heavy snow and strong winds are creating very dangerous avalanche conditions. Human-triggered and natural avalanches are likely on all steep slopes. Traveling in and below steep terrain is not recommended. Avalanches can be triggered from flat terrain. Steep slopes can avalanche far above and run into lower-angled terrain. Website: www.mtavalanche.com Avalanche Hotline: 406-587-6981 This warning will expire or be updated by 6:00 a.m. on Wednesday, March 15, 2023.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
